text: Sano ajula (Potifala) jwa ku Misra jwawansumile (Yusufu) wasalile wankwakwe kuti: “Munkolochesyani ndamo jakwe, mwine chachitukamuchisya, kapena tugambe kuntenda kuwa mwanache (jwetu).” Soni iyyoyopeyo niyatwatite pakuntamilichikasya Yusufu m’chilambo (cha Misra), soni kuti tun’jiganye gopolela abali (sya sagamisi). Sano Allah ni Jwakupunda pa itendo Yakwe, nambo wandu wajinji ngakumanyilila
